alert.note: Alert for Coastal Waldo; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 26 at 11:35AM EDT until October 26 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: .Heavy rained fueled by tropical moisture, is moving N into the northward into the coast of Maine and southeastern NH this afternoon. Isolated thunderstorms are possible as well. Areas that receive several heavy bands of rain or a slow moving band of rain may experience flooding. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Maine, including the following areas, Coastal Waldo, Interior Waldo, Kennebec, Knox, Lincoln, Sagadahoc and Southern Somerset. * WHEN...Until 9 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas, especially where fallen leaves block storm drains.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Waldo; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc
